entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
